metadata.title: CVE-2014-3619 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The __socket_proto_state_machine function in GlusterFS 3.5 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via a "00000000"fragment header.

criterions.comment: glusterfs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
